resources.string: Tsarin fayil ɗin ku ba ya tallafawa fayiloli sama da 4GB
Binciken idan tsarin fayil zai iya ƙirƙirar fayilolin 4GB
Rashin buɗe fayil Don Allah yi ƙoƙari ya nemi wannan fayil a cikin Na’urar Tab na Laburarenka
Babu app da aka samo don zaɓar fayil ɗin zim!
Zaɓi fayil ɗin zim don karantawa
